#summary Add a contact as a friend

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_user


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
|| *Required* || *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| required || jabberId || jid || Jabber ID of the user adding friends to their list. ||
|| || remoteJabberId || jid || Comma separated list of jabber IDs to add to the contact list of the adding user. ||
</table>

==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
|| *Code* || *Exception* || *Description* ||
|| -1 || INVALID_USERID || Contact [id: ####] does not exist.||
|| -2 || ALREADY_IN_CONTACTS || Contact [id: ####] is already your contact. ||
|| 401 || UnauthorizedUserException || You are not authorized to make requests as userid ###. Authorized as ####. ||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <addContact jabberId="###@jabber.dev.tokbox.com" remoteJabberId="#####@jabber.dev.tokbox.com">
          <batchAddResults count="1">
               <contactResult jabberId="#####@jabber.dev.tokbox.com" result="SUCCESS"/>
          </batchAddResults>
     </addContact>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/contacts/add</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="###"/>
     <timer startTime="1221985001.1467" execTime="720.49307823181"/>
</tokResult>
}}}
